articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa shooting leaves 12 dead, including young child: Police - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Police say 25 people were shot at ‘illegal’ bar in hostel in Pretoria, with three children among the dead.
articles.content:
Gunmen have killed at least 12 people, including a three-year-old boy, in a mass shooting at a bar near the South African city of Pretoria, according to police.
